text: Rick Resa is a paralympic athlete from the United States competing mainly in category C2 events. Resa competed in the 1984 Summer Paralympics in athletics and swimming. In swimming, he won a gold medal in Men's 25 m Freestyle with Aids C1. ==References== Category:Paralympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:Paralympic swimmers of the United States Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in swimming
title: Rick Resa
